original_text: When Jesus had finished saying all these things, he went away from Galilee. He went to the part of Judea that is on the other side of the Jordan River.
korean_text: 예수께서 이 말씀을 마치시고 갈릴리를 떠나 요단 강 건너 유대 지경에 이르시니

sentences.original_text: When Jesus had finished saying all these things
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 이 모든 것을 말씀하신 후에

sentences.original_text: He went to the part of Judea
that is on the other side of the Jordan River
